name: Shopping.GitHub.io
body:
Zihan (Bertina) Zhai
Computer Science Major
Phone:778.891.6676
E-Mail: bertina.han@gmail.com
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Languages:		Java, C ,C++, SQL, JavaScript, Node.js, Haskall, Golang
Tools/IDE:	              Eclipse, Git, Xcode
Testing:		JUnit, Jasmine
PROGRAMMING PROJECT
•	Delivery IOS App (Academic) 						         Sep – Dec 2015
o	Design and implement front end and back end of a food delivery app
o	Use Cordova to build multiplatform app
o	Design test cases and implement with Jasmine
o	Organized the group meetings with 4 members and delegated the tasks. 
•	Shopping Website (Academic) 						          Sep – Dec 2015	
o	Use JavaScript to listen for events made by clients through User Interface, and HTML and CSS is used to optimize the User Interface
o	Use Node.js to build Back End Server, so as to retrieve information from the Front End, then store it to the Database
o	MongoDB is used to store and query data, which is clients’ shopping amount in this case
•	Music Company Database (Academic)			      	            Sep– Dec 2014
o	Designed and implemented a database tool which can edit and read restaurant information
o	Used Java to do the user interface, and used JDBC, MySQL and Oracle to store and read restaurant information
•	Parking lot Web App (Academic)					            Nov- Dec 2014
o	Designed and implemented a data-intensive web application which can search parking lots in Great Vancouver
o	Used Google Web Toolkit and Java to deliver the application online Used Google App Engine to host my application. 
o	Learned how to leverage APIs and cloud computing infrastructure. 
o	http://1-dot-inner-chassis-845.appspot.com
WORKING EXPERIENCE                                                                                                         
UBC Graduate Student Society (GSS)
•	System Administrator    						March 2015 – May 2016 
o	Windows Server and Linux Server Maintenance. 
o	Hardware and Software trouble shooting
o	Advise on hardware purchase and security question.

Children and Family Research Institution (CFRI)        
•	IT Support							       May 2015 – May 2016 
o	Mostly work on Tier 1 IT ticket
o	Printer debug, software configuration

VOLUNTEER EXPERIENCE                                                                                                   
Langara College ESL Public Speaking Club                                            January 2012 – January 2013
•	Executive
o	Advertise for Club events, and make Flyers and emails for members
o	Prepare content for Club’s event, like find popular topics and material for the speaking event
EDUCATION                                                                                                                             
•	University of British Columbia, Vancouver, BC	
Faculty of Science: Major in Computer Science		Sep 2013 ~ May 2016 
•	Langara College, Vancouver, BC	
Faculty of Science: Major in Computer Science		 Sep 2011 ~ Apr 2013

HOBBIES                                                                                                                                   
•	Swimming
•	Hiking
